<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_snc_apex_gp.gemini.analyze.user</event_name><name>gemini.analyze.user</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runAction(current, event, parm1, parm2, parm3) {
    try {
        var helper = new GeminiChurnHelper();
        helper.analyzeUser(parm1); // parm1 = user_id
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Gemini ScriptAction failed: " + ex.message);
    }
})(current, event, parm1, parm2, parm3);
]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-22 16:10:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>838a2b0983e722107f442a4279da1ed2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gemini.analyze.user</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Apex GP" source="x_snc_apex_gp">3d6f8a89832322107f442a4279da1ef2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Apex GP">3d6f8a89832322107f442a4279da1ef2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_838a2b0983e722107f442a4279da1ed2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-22 16:10:55</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
